tree.name: Dereck Lively II
tree.tradeDescription: Dallas traded #10 pick (Cason Wallace) and Davis Bertans to OKC for #12 pick (Dereck Lively II)

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 DAL #10 Overall Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Dallas own 2023 first-round pick, traded to OKC on draft night

assetsGivenUp.name: Davis Bertans
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: DAL acquired Bertans and Dinwiddie from WAS for Porzingis and a 2nd round pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Latvian forward, 2011 #42 pick by Indiana, rights traded to SAS with Kawhi Leonard

assetsGivenUp.name: Kristaps Porzingis
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: DAL acquired Porzingis from NYK for Dennis Smith Jr., DeAndre Jordan, and 2 future 1sts
assetsGivenUp.note: Latvian forward, 2015 #4 pick by New York

assetsGivenUp.name: Dennis Smith Jr.
assetsGivenUp.note: NC State guard, drafted #9 by Dallas

assetsGivenUp.name: DeAndre Jordan
assetsGivenUp.note: Signed as free agent from LA Clippers

assetsGivenUp.name: 2021 DAL 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Unprotected, conveyed to New York as #21 overall

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 DAL 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Top-10 protected, did not convey in 2023, rolled to 2024 as #24 overall to New York
